title: Proposal to Add Part-time Discord Moderator Djnuggets
body:
Purpose
Add a scheduled part-time Discord moderator for the shift leading up to Soul's night-time coverage, 3-4 days a week. This will allow Rally staff members to better focus on their work (rather than diverting attention to Discord) while also ensuring better responsiveness in the Rally Discord.
This would be a 6 month renewable contract.

Scope
3 or 4 days per week, target ~20 hrs/wk, max 30 hrs/wk
    -Late evenings through early night, 7pm-12am ET / 4-9pm PT
    -Times to be adjusted as needed
    -Days of the week to be adjusted as needed
    -Days worked in a week should be as a 'block' of days, not spread out over the week (i.e. Sun-Tues, or Wed-Fri)

Roles/Responsibilities:
Work with Community Ambassador Soul of Jacobeh
Discord Moderation / Interaction
    -Field common questions and utilize existing literature (commands, wiki, blog, forum) to answer
    -Route more complicated questions up to Soul
    -Emphasize repeat questions to Soul for command creation / wiki additions / etc.
Keep up to date with big Rally changes, such as website upgrades, significant network upgrades, and significant integrations or big platform cooperative efforts

Compensation
3,000 USDC per month

Voting
A "Yes" vote approves Djnuggets for 6 months as a Discord moderator.
A "No" vote would not approve this.
author: 0xE2cC777D59b4D354FF1D55aDd7579726d04430C0
